messages.body:
Before this eight-month foray, Rabbi Ben Zona appeared in such as adventures as

CIRCUMSPECTION IF THE FALAFEL LOOK LIKE GOLD, andFAMILY PLOT.

Cast
, Central Bank of Nigeria (not!)
 -  a chattered accountant
 - the name under which the scammer means to pick up the money order from his victim (appears only by mention)
vs.
 - humble shepherd of his flock, and dedicated family man
 - a legal advisor (appears only by mention)
 - the Rabbi's personal assistant (makes a brief appearance)
messages.raw:
Before this eight-month foray, Rabbi Ben Zona appeared in such as adventures as

CIRCUMSPECTION
IF THE FALAFEL LOOK LIKE GOLD, and
FAMILY PLOT.

Cast

Sam Coker, Central Bank of Nigeria (not!)
Mrs. Annette E. Jenkins - a chattered accountant
Charles Chedom - the name under which the scammer means to pick up the money order from his victim (appears only by mention)

vs.

Rabbi Ben Zona - humble shepherd of his flock, and dedicated family man
Owata Dikedjua - a legal advisor (appears only by mention)
Mimi Pontipine - the Rabbi's personal assistant (makes a brief appearance)

messages.body:
I was really having fun getting them off-script but I think it lost its momentum and started to drag on a bit.  I was still willing to give it a go - still might - but they didn't seem too keen.

I present Mr. Sam Coker and Mrs. Anne Jenkins.  Roll 'em.
messages.raw:

messages.subject: This Is My Last Email To You
messages.body:
August 22, 2009

IP: 82.128.71.151 (Lagos, Nigeria)


FROM THE DESK OF SAM COKER
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
INTERNATIONAL OPERATION DEPT
PAYMENT CENTER OFFICE
VICTORIA ISLAND
LAGOS-NIGERIA .


Attn: Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona


This is to inform you that you have the sum of 11.5 million dollars with this fund can from the MTN network this is a communication company that issue out over 100 million dollars to 10 lucky winners in the world which you are one of the beneficiary, bear this in mind that it happened 3 years ago which we have been sending you email for you too come and claim your fund but you ignored us i don't know why. 



Last two years some one stole your information from our data base in our company after they know you have the sum of $11,500,000.00 United State Dollars they made you believe that they are the only one that can transfer the fund to you, we know they have been colleting money from you telling one or two liars given you hope that they trying their best to transfer the fund from you.


I want you to know that we have caught some of them but some are still contacting you the only that will stop is if you stop every email of transfer that is coming Central Bank of Nigeria that is the only way can stop them.


Now some one came to how bank to inform us that you have been receiving all the email we have been sending to you but due to your position at hand and you believe that is a scam you don't want to reply the email that is why you sent him to come and claim the fund as a compensation of what he has done for you this person's name is Jerome Lewis he is from United State Of America.


We are sending this last email after this email we are not going to send you any more email about this fund because right now we are ready to transfer the fund to him because my boss told me that if you did not reply this email within 48 hours we are going to transfer the fund to him, if you want me to send you is international passport for you to confirm if you know him or not i am going to send it to you.


For your information in case you are ready to claim the fund we have all your information that we need to transfer the fund but you need to send us your information again for yours to be sure that you are the one who is replying this email that is if you still want the fund to be transfer to you be rest assured  that this is no scam.


That is all for now and please do not reply all the email you see in your email address by that way you are helping us to fight scam in Nigeria.


Await your responds


Yours faithfully


Mr Sam Coker
+2348032155988

We are sending this last email after this email we are not going to send you any more email about this fund because right now we are ready to transfer the fund to him because my boss told me that if you did not reply this email within 48 hours we are going to transfer the fund to him, if you want me to send you is international passport for you to confirm if you know him or not i am going to send it to you.

For your information in case you are ready to claim the fund we have all your information that we need to transfer the fund but you need to send us your information again for yours to be sure that you are the one who is replying this email that is if you still want the fund to be transfer to you be rest assured that this is no scam.

messages.body:
August 22, 2009

Dear Mr. Coker,


You must be mistaken.  I've never received an email from you, and I know nothing about money at the Central Bank of Nigeria.  I've had many dealings with West Africa but I'm sure I'd remember that I'd have $11.5M lying around somewhere, though with my millions lying in offshore accounts none of this really surprises me.


What is this MTN network?  Are they known by another name?


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

messages.body:
August 24, 2009

Dear Mr. Coker,


Can you please refresh my memory with the information I've given you?  Or at the very least show me my bank statement?


What does this mean:  That is all for now and please do not reply all the email you see in your email address by that way you are helping us to fight scam in Nigeria. It's funny that you mention me helping you fight scams in Nigeria.  I'm not sure what this has to do with my $11.5M at hand, though.  I have a barrister in Nigeria named  who is also fighting scams, and has the track record to prove it.  I've sent him over $24,000US to release a secondary fund, which he assures me is on my way in the next day or two.  You can reach him at xxx@xxx.com and ask him yourself.


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

messages.body:
August 30, 2009

Dear Sam,
You quote me an utterly ridiculous bank fee: $250 for an account that's been demented for 3 years?  Aunt Shprintza Zlata has been demented far longer and costs far less. 


Why don't you foot that bill and take it out of my $11,500,000.00 dollars?  Better yet, you pay it yourself in person, and I'll write you a cheque for 10 times the amount.


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

messages.subject: Hello Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona,
messages.body:
September 5, 2009



Hello Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona,


I am Mrs. Annette E. Jenkins, I am a US citizen, 48 years Old. I reside in District of Columbia 20534. My residential address is as follows 320 First Street, NW Washington, District of Columbia 20534, United States, am thinking of moving since I am now wealthy. I am one of those that took part in the Compensation in Nigeria many years ago and they refused to pay me, I had paid over $42,000 while in the US, trying to get my payment all to no avail.


So I decided to travel down to Nigeria with all my compensation documents, And I was directed to meet Mr. Sam Coker, who is the member of Central Bank Of Nigeria and a Head of Transfer Department, and I contacted him and he explained everything to me. He said whoever is contacting us through emails are fake.


He took me to the Governor of Central Bank of Nigeria. Right now I am the most happiest woman on earth because I have received my compensation funds amounteing to $15,000,000.00 Moreover,Mr. Sam Coker, showed me the full information of those that are yet to receive their payments and I saw your email as one of the scam victims, that is why I decided to email you to stop dealing with those people, they are not with your fund, they are only making money out of you. I will advise you to contact Mr. Sam Coker


You have to contact him directly on this information below.


COMPENSATION AWARD HOUSE
Name : Mr. Sam Coker
Email: samcoker25@yahoo.it
Phone: +2348032155988


You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting you and telling you that your fund is with them, it is not in anyway with them, they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you up until you have nothing.


The only money I paid after I meet Mr. Sam Coker was just $580 for the paper works, take note of that.


Thank You and Be Blessed.


Mrs. Annette E. Jenkins
320 First Street, NW
Washington, District of Columbia 20534 USA.

messages.body:
September 8, 2009

Hello, Mrs. Jenkins!  Thank you for writing back.  
My trepidation in sending money ahead of time to Mr. Coker is well-founded.  Thousands of dollars are sent to Africa from Western countries every year, as that area of the world is rife with scam artists, the very sort Mr. Coker purports to be combatting daily. 


I also haven't seen any proof that this money actually exists, nor do I remember specifically working on a contract in West Africa, nor remember ever visiting the country in the first place.  Do you think this would pose a problem, or am I needlessly worrying?


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas
messages.raw:
Rabbi Ben Zona
September 8, 2009

Hello, Mrs. Jenkins! Thank you for writing back.
My trepidation in sending money ahead of time to Mr. Coker is well-founded. Thousands of dollars are sent to Africa from Western countries every year, as that area of the world is rife with scam artists, the very sort Mr. Coker purports to be combatting daily.

I also haven't seen any proof that this money actually exists, nor do I remember specifically working on a contract in West Africa, nor remember ever visiting the country in the first place. Do you think this would pose a problem, or am I needlessly worrying?

Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

Mrs. Jenkins,
Why are you contacting him on my behalf?  Respectfully, you don't even know me. Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

messages.body:
October 15, 2009

Dear Mrs. Jenkins,
Aren't we getting ahead of ourselves?  You haven't even been hired yet and you want us to pay you?  I don't know how it works on your side of the world, but that certainly isn't how it works here.


Incidentally, the board of directors will never accept your job application.  Why, you've only filled out half the form!  I suggest you have another bash at it.  When it's through, we'll send out the other stuff you need to give us, banking information, that kind of thing.


We are located in Kfar Bamba, Israel, a small village in the north of the country, outside of Kiryat Zevel just beyond Kibbutz Shiksa.


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

messages.body:
October 24, 2009

Mrs. Jenkins,
This doesn't bode well for you on two counts:


1.  You are a millionaire a few times over and you want us to spot you $500.
2.  You haven't even completed a job application, let alone been hired, and yet you want a salary advance.


I suggest you at least complete the job application before asking the board to release any funds.


Incidentally, the position pays about $2,000 per month, so you might also want to go back and revise your salary expectations.


Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

Have you completed the insurance forms that have been sent your way?

Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas

(I never sent her any forms.)

messages.body:
March 10, 2010



Anne,
Are you trying to take my job from me?  Who are you, anyway? Why is Rabbi Ben Zona interested in you?


Mimi
messages.raw:
Mimi Pontipine
March 10, 2010

From: Mimi Pontipine

Anne,
Are you trying to take my job from me? Who are you, anyway? Why is Rabbi Ben Zona interested in you?

Mimi

messages.body:
March 10, 2010

Dear Ben Zona
Thanks for your email, i will like you to know i have an international diplomatic passport i can go were in the world i believe i have told you before that all i need is $500 dollars to pay my flight ticket from Nigeria to your country and you promise me that if i fill out the form you make i have the money to come down to your country so i will resume work.

Mrs. Anne Jenkins
messages.raw:
Mrs. Annette E. Jenkins
March 10, 2010

Dear Ben Zona
Thanks for your email, i will like you to know i have an international diplomatic passport i can go were in the world i believe i have told you before that all i need is $500 dollars to pay my flight ticket from Nigeria to your country and you promise me that if i fill out the form you make i have the money to come down to your country so i will resume work.

Mrs. Anne Jenkins

messages.body:
April 25, 2010

Mrs. Jenkins,
Afraid to tell you this, but we've got a hiring freeze at the moment.  The board isn't looking to add any new characters this side of Shavuot. 

Unless of course, you want the job badly enough...

Sincerely,
Dr. Rabbi Ben Zona
Congregation Patsch Intuchas
messages.raw:
Rabbi Ben Zona

(then a month-long break from scambaiting ensued...)
